Feb. 17, 2007 D Porthcawl Miners' Eisteddfod
Porthcawl Miners' Eisteddfod 0 Entertainments Contest
porthcawl-miner-s-eisteddfod
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Best Soloist: Steve Barnsley, Soprano, Cwmaman Institute Most Entertaining Band: Tongwynlais Temperance Highest Placed First Section Band: Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Youngest player: Richard Cartlidge, BTM Band (13) Prizes - 1st £1000, 2nd £500, 3rd £300.
Dec. 13, 2011, 9:56 p.m. July 3, 2020, 9:55 a.m.
1 BTM Band Jason Katsikaris
2 Parc and Dare Band Richard Evans
3 Burry Port Junior Band Andrew Jones
4 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Gareth Pritchard
5 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Ian Porthouse
6 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Rhodri Griffiths
